author: Ana Bradshaw
text:
The City of San Antonio is evaluating its process for monitoring HUD grants including CDBG and HOME. The forms being currently used are a hybrid of several of the HUD forms.
We would like to find out what forms do other municipalities use? Does anyone use the monitoring form available on the HUD website? If not, how were the current forms developed and how are they maintained?
title: CDBG & HOME Grant Monitoring
